hero.title: About Quizzy
hero.subtitle: Empowering learners through innovative quiz technology and AI-driven study assistance
hero.description: We believe that learning should be engaging, accessible, and personalized. Our platform combines gamified quizzes with intelligent AI assistance to create a comprehensive learning experience.

timeline.title: Our Journey
timeline.subtitle: From a simple idea to a global platform serving thousands of learners worldwide

items.title: Company Founded
items.description: Started our journey with a simple idea: to revolutionize how people learn through gamified quizzes. Founded with a vision to build the ultimate learning platform for modern education.

items.title: MVP Launch & First Users
items.description: Successfully launched our minimum viable product after 6 months of development. Onboarded our first 1,000 users and achieved product-market fit with 95% user satisfaction.

items.title: AI Assistant Integration
items.description: Integrated advanced AI technology to provide intelligent study assistance, step-by-step explanations, and personalized learning guidance for our users.

items.title: Global Expansion
items.description: Expanded our platform to support 25+ languages including Arabic, reaching learners across 50+ countries with localized content and culturally relevant quizzes.

items.title: Advanced Analytics Launch
items.description: Launched comprehensive learning analytics and progress tracking features to help educators and learners understand performance patterns and optimize study strategies.

items.title: Enterprise Solutions
items.description: Developing enterprise-grade solutions for educational institutions with advanced security, SSO integration, and administrative dashboards for managing large-scale learning programs.

items.title: Mobile App Launch
items.description: Launching native mobile applications for iOS and Android with offline capabilities, push notifications, and seamless synchronization across all devices.

items.title: Global Learning Network
items.description: Building partnerships with educational institutions worldwide to create a comprehensive learning ecosystem that connects learners, educators, and content creators globally.

stats.title: Our Impact
stats.subtitle: Numbers that speak to our commitment to education
